name: Sword and Plow
description:
An RPG mixed with a gardening game!

Can a farmer slay an evil dragon?
Grow and eat your food to gain strength
Drag items with the left mouse button.
Use and equip items in your inventory with a right click. Drag seeds onto the farm plot squares to either side of your inventory to grow crops.

You can attack enemies just before they attack to interrupt them, or just after they attack for a critical hit!
Don't forget to equip helmets and armor you find!

You can also use the number keys to use items, and the arrow keys to move.

Made for Ludum Dare 41 jam, with the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

Game by Francis Coulombe (-twitter @FrancisCoulombe )
With music by Tadakuni Amano (-twitter @askiisoft )

If you are playing this to judge for the Ludum Dare, please play the LUDUM DARE JAM version of the game. The polished version has fixes and extra content added after the jam!
